short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The easiest way to share, post and schedule web content, blogs and articles to all of your social media networks.
short.pt_BR,pt_PT: A maneira mais fácil de compartilhar, publicar e agendar conteúdo em todas as mídias sociais.
short.ta: உங்கள் சமூக வலைப்பின்னல்களில் அனைத்து பகிர எளிதான வழி, பதவியை மற்றும் அட்டவணை இணைய உள்ளடக்கத்துடன்.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Eclincher is a leading all-in-one platform designed to simplify and automate social media management, online listening management and local SEO enhancement. Our innovative tools empower businesses and agencies to optimize their digital marketing efforts efficiently and effectively.
long.pt_BR,pt_PT,ta: eClincher is a complete, yet intuitive social media management software. Offers publishing & scheduling, auto post queues, social inbox, engagement, monitoring, content curation, influencers, analytics, reports, team collaboration...Twitter, Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, G+, Pinterest ...
